translation.LAUNCH_SPEECH: I can tell you about Virginia Lottery games. How can I help?
translation.LAUNCH_REPROMPT: For example, you can say, "Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery for the Mega Millions jack-pot"
translation.JACKPOT_POWERBALL: The current jackpot for Powerball is {{jackpotValue}} with a cash value of {{cashValue}}.
translation.JACKPOT_MEGAMILLIONS: The current jackpot for Mega Millions is {{jackpotValue}} with a cash value of {{cashValue}}.
translation.JACKPOT_CASH5: The current jackpot for Cash 5 with Easy Match is {{jackpotValue}}. ,
translation.JACKPOT_INVALID: Hmm. I don't have jackpot information for {{lotteryGame}}.
translation.JACKPOT_GAMES: I can tell you the jackpot values for Mega millions, Powerball, Cash 5 with Easy Match, and the Print and Play Rolling Jackpot.
translation.JACKPOT_TROUBLE: I'm having trouble looking that up right now. Try again later.
translation.JACKPOT_ROLLING_INVALID: I'm having trouble finding information on the Print en Play Rolling Jackpot. Try again later.
translation.JACKPOT_ROLLINGJACKPOT: The estimated jackpot for Print n Play Rolling Jackpot is {{jackpotValue}} as of {{jackpotDate}}
translation.RAFFLE_TICKETS: There are currently {{raffleTickets}} new years eve raffle tickets left!
translation.RAFFLE_OUT: The 2021 New Year’s Millionaire Raffle from the Virginia Lottery has officially sold out. Try again next year, be sure to purchase early and good luck.
translation.RAFFLE_END: The 2021 New Year’s Millionaire Raffle from the Virginia Lottery has officially ended. Try again next year, be sure to purchase early and good luck.
translation.RAFFLE_TROUBLE: I'm having trouble looking that up right now. Try again later.
translation.DRAWING_POWERBALL: Powerball draws are held Wednesday and Saturday at eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_MEGAMILLIONS: Mega Million draws are held Tuesday and Friday at eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_BANKMILLION: Bank a Million draws are held Wednesday and Saturday at eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_CASH4LIFE: Cash for Life draws are held every day at nine p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_CASH5: Drawings for cash five with easy match  happen every day at eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_CASH5_OLD: Drawings for cash five winning numbers happen every day at one fifty nine p.m. and eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_PICK4: Drawings for pick four winning numbers happen every day at one fifty nine p.m. and eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_PICK3: Drawings for pick three winning numbers happen every day at one fifty nine p.m. and eleven p.m.,
translation.DRAWING_INVALID: Hmm. I don't have draw time information for {{lotteryGame}}.,
translation.DRAWING_GAMES: You can ask about draw times for: Mega millions, Powerball, Bank a million,  Cash Five, Cash for life, Pick four, or Pick 3.
translation.DRAWING_ROLLINGJACKPOT: Print n’ Play Rolling Jackpot is an instant-win game.  No playslips to fill out, and no waiting for a drawing. Visit a Lottery retailer to play today.
translation.NUMBERS_POWERBALL: The Powerball numbers from {{date}} are {{numbers}} and the power ball is {{bonusBall}}.
translation.NUMBERS_MEGAMILLIONS: The Mega Millions numbers from {{date}} are {{numbers}} and the mega ball is {{bonusBall}}.
translation.NUMBERS_BANKMILLION: The Bank a Million numbers from {{date}} are {{numbers}} and the bonus ball is {{bonusBall}}.
translation.NUMBERS_CASH4LIFE: The Cash for Life numbers from {{date}} are {{numbers}} and the cash ball is {{bonusBall}}.
translation.NUMBERS_CASH5: The Cash Five with Easy Match numbers for {{date}} are {{numbers}}, and {{bonusBall}}.
translation.NUMBERS_PICK4: The Pick Four {{time}} numbers for {{date}} are {{numbers}}, and the Fireball is {{fireball}}.
translation.NUMBERS_PICK3: The Pick Three {{time}} numbers for {{date}} are {{numbers}}, and the Fireball is {{fireball}}.
translation.NUMBERS_FUTURE: The {{lotteryGame}} {{time}} numbers for {{date}} haven't been drawn yet.
translation.NUMBERS_INVALID: Hmm. I don't know the winning numbers for {{lotteryGame}}.
translation.NUMBERS_GAMES: I can tell you winning numbers for: Mega millions, Powerball, Bank a million,  Cash Five, Cash for life, Pick four, or Pick 3.
translation.NUMBERS_TROUBLE: I'm having trouble looking that up right now. Try again later.
translation.NUMBERS_ROLLINGJACKPOT: Print en Play Rolling Jackpot is an instant-win game.  No playslips to fill out, and no waiting for a drawing. Visit a Lottery retailer to play today.
translation.OUTBOUND_MESSAGE: Go to vee eh lottery dot com to find out more.
translation.HELP_MESSAGE: What can I help you with?
translation.HELP_LIST: Just say, Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery to list games
translation.HELP_TIMES: Just say, Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery when is the next drawing time?
translation.HELP_NUMBERS: Just say, Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery to tell me the numbers
translation.HELP_JACKPOT: Just say, Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery what is the jackpot?
translation.LIST_GAMES: I can tell you about Print en Play Rolling Jackpot, Cash for Life, Power Ball, Mega Millions, Bank a Million, Cash Five with Easy Match, Pick Four, and Pick Three.
translation.LIST_INTENTS: I can tell you about winning numbers, next drawings, and jack-pots.
translation.EXAMPLE_INVOCATION: For example, you can say, "Alexa, ask Virginia Lottery for the Mega Millions jack-pot"
